# <a name="saving-messages-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="5da10-102">Berichten opslaan in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-102">Saving messages in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5da10-103">U e-mailberichten niet opslaan in Outlook.com, maar u ze afdrukken naar een PDF die u op uw pc opslaan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-103">You cannot save email messages in Outlook.com, but you can print them to a PDF which you can save on your PC.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5da10-104">Met het hulpprogramma Microsoft Print To PDF in Windows 10 u elk e-mailbericht rechtstreeks naar een PDF afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-104">The Microsoft Print To PDF utility included in Windows 10 allows you to print any email message directly to a PDF.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="5da10-105">Selecteer het bericht dat u wilt opslaan.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-105">Select the message you want to save.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="5da10-106">De drie puntjes selecteren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-106">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="5da10-107">boven aan het bericht en selecteer vervolgens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-107">at the top of the message and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="5da10-108">**Afdrukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-108">**Print**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="5da10-109">Selecteer Opnieuw **afdrukken** en selecteer in het vervolgkeuzemenu van de printer De optie **Microsoft Afdrukken op PDF**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-109">Select **Print** again, and from the printer drop-down menu, select **Microsoft Print to PDF**.</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="5da10-110">Selecteer **Afdrukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-110">Select **Print**.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="5da10-111">Voer een bestandsnaam in en selecteer **Opslaan**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-111">Enter a file name then select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5da10-112">**Let op:** Dit wordt niet aanbevolen op gedeelde of openbare computers, omdat andere gebruikers toegang kunnen hebben tot PDF's die u op de pc opslaat en niet verwijdert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-112">**Note:** This is not recommended on shared or public computers as other users could have access to any PDFs you save to the PC and don't delete.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5da10-113">Zie [E-mailberichten, bijlagen en agenda's afdrukken in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)voor meer informatie over afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5da10-113">For more information about printing, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
